Revert back into agreement with cited supporting source. Tweak cites.
/* Aquino's assassination */ Remove unneeded duplicate citation, and inappropriate tags (citation clearly supports the text in question).
[[:en:WP:CLEANER|WPCleaner]] (v1.09) Repairing link to disambiguation page - [[WP:DPL|(You can help)]] - [[Filipino]]
Remove unreliable sources, and information contradicted by higher-quality scholarly sources.
/* Martial law and the New Society */ Add reference.
Moving cousin comment out of lead and into caption for Ramos.
/* Economy */ Chopping off some uncited parts, and moving behest loans up to part about debt.
/* Economy */ Adding information on external debt.
/* Economy */ Add information on agricultural output.
/* Martial law and the New Society */
/* Second term (1969-1981) */ Add info about military and economic aid.
/* Aquino's assassination */ mesoderm: please do grow up and try not to start an edit war
/* Aquino's assassination */ Placate obnoxious IP editor who for some reason needs the same citation in three places, instead of just at the end of the paragraph.
/* Aquino's assassination */ citations needed for mentioned evidence. Please read wikipedia's verifiability policy carefully!
/* Legacy */ inflammatory text irrelevant to topic removed, please recall wikipedia AGF before doing rollback!
Undid revision 436820653 by [[Special:Contributions/121.96.58.194|121.96.58.194]] ([[User talk:121.96.58.194|talk]]) Read the citation that's already there. It directly supports these statements.
/* Aquino's assassination */ needs citations for mentioned evidence.See wikipedia on citing sources before deleting
Reverted to revision 436753933 by 121.54.2.91: Removed reliably sourced information without a policy-based explanation.. ([[WP:TW|TW]])
/* Aquino's assassination */ please add citations when adding sensitive text- please check Wikipedia policy for more info
/* Downfall */ Subjective and polemical text excised- making Marcos personally responsible for aquino's murder is an accusation of his opponents and not factual
/* Legacy */ Unnecessary inflammatory text removed and need for note added, self-serving statement by enrile irrelevant to topic removed
/* Legacy */ IP had this one right.
/* Early life */ Add a reference for Ang Maharlika.
/* Legacy */ Mark uncited statement. I also removed an uncited POV statement.
Reverted to revision 436175709 by 86.174.124.91: Removed large amounts of information that was backed by reliable sources, with no explanation.. ([[WP:TW|TW]])
/* Martial law and the New Society (1972-1981) */ spelling
/* Martial law and the New Society (1972-1981) */ Spelling, and MOS fix
/* Martial law and the New Society (1972-1981) */ More on declaration of martial law.
/* Martial law and the New Society (1972-1981) */ Add information on U.S.-Filipino activists.
/* Downfall */ Add another reference regarding opposition in 1986 election.
/* Vietnam War */ Not the best source for historical information, especially regarding Vietnam.
/* Infrastructure programs */ Remove unneeded footnote, and tag sourcing issues (the Philippine government is probably not the best source for historical information on this)

All non-free files used on this page must have valid and specific rationale for use on this page; please see [[Wikipedia:Non-free use rationale guideline]] for more information; one or more files removed due to missing rationale
/* Martial law and the New Society (1972-1981) */ Add reference to Brands, 1992
/* Impeachment attempt */ Remove uncited bloat, tag parts that need citations, and add reference for impeachment proceedings (also mentions the San Jose Mercury News story, but doesn't give title)

/* Second term (1969-1981) */ Add a small section for the [[First Quarter Storm]], which needs expansion. (It could possibly be converted into a section on protests against the regime, in general, rather than just this one)
/* Economy */ Add good book on financial situation during Marcos era.
Combine sections for second term and 1969 campaign, and remove uncited material.
Remove unreliable sources (about.com & pilipino-express.com) and rewrite lead sentence.
/* Early life */ Add reference for birthplace, parents, etc.
/* Early life */ Trim fluff, and add reference.
More trimming, and add information regarding first campaign.
/* Economy */ Again, this doesn't read well, but the rest of the section needs to be rewritten anyway, and this is a great resource on the regime's economic policies.
/* Martial law and the New Society (1972-1981) */ Add information about the Kabataang Barangay.
/* Second term (1969-1981) */ Add information about campaign funding.
/* Economy */ Tag more citation issues, add information about timber industry.
/* Downfall */ Remove unreliable source (bookrags.com). Clean up reference to book, adding link to Google Books preview.
/* The re-emergence of the Communist movement */ Uncited / OR
/* Second term (1969-1981) */ Remove unreliable source (About.com) and unsourced paragraph.
Use wording supported by large majority of sources. Also remove source that didn't support the statement citing it.
/* Post-presidency */ Remove unreliable sources. Add source for class-action suit.
/* Downfall */ Add reference regarding flight after the inauguration of Aquino.
/* Martial law and the New Society (1972-1981) */
/* Second term (1969-1981) */ Added a citation re: electoral fraud, and placed tags on parts that need citation.
/* Legacy */ This is not an "allegation". A very large number of sources accept this, and I do not know of a single source that denies it.
/* 1969 presidential election */ Rewrite regarding campaign, and remove uncited comment about "nuisance candidates"
/* Post-presidency */ Doesn't flow well, but this whole section needs to be rewritten anyway. I'm mostly adding it as a source which can be used to expand the article later.
*He benefited from a large personality cult in the Philippines during his regime.* This cult has not existed during Marcos' regime per reading of the reference. Rephrasing for accuracy.
